BatchGetItem.name: BatchGetItem
BatchGetItem.description: Returns the attributes of one or more items from one or more tables

BatchWriteItem.name: BatchWriteItem
BatchWriteItem.description: Puts or deletes multiple items in one or more tables

ConditionCheckItem.name: ConditionCheckItem
ConditionCheckItem.description:
The ConditionCheckItem operation checks the existence of a set of attributes for the
                                                item with the given primary key

CreateBackup.name: CreateBackup
CreateBackup.description: Creates a backup for an existing table

CreateGlobalTable.name: CreateGlobalTable
CreateGlobalTable.description: Enables the user to create a global table from an existing table

CreateTable.name: CreateTable
CreateTable.description: The CreateTable operation adds a new table to your account

DeleteBackup.name: DeleteBackup
DeleteBackup.description: Deletes an existing backup of a table

DeleteItem.name: DeleteItem
DeleteItem.description: Deletes a single item in a table by primary key

DeleteTable.name: DeleteTable
DeleteTable.description: The DeleteTable operation deletes a table and all of its items

DeleteTableReplica.name: DeleteTableReplica
DeleteTableReplica.description: Deletes a replica table and all of its items

DescribeBackup.name: DescribeBackup
DescribeBackup.description: Describes an existing backup of a table

DescribeContinuousBackups.name: DescribeContinuousBackups
DescribeContinuousBackups.description: Checks the status of the backup restore settings on the specified table

DescribeContributorInsights.name: DescribeContributorInsights
DescribeContributorInsights.description:
Describes the contributor insights status and related details for a given table or
                                                global secondary index

DescribeExport.name: DescribeExport
DescribeExport.description: Describes an existing Export of a table

DescribeGlobalTable.name: DescribeGlobalTable
DescribeGlobalTable.description: Returns information about the specified global table

DescribeGlobalTableSettings.name: DescribeGlobalTableSettings
DescribeGlobalTableSettings.description: Returns settings information about the specified global table

DescribeKinesisStreamingDestination.name: DescribeKinesisStreamingDestination
DescribeKinesisStreamingDestination.description:
Grants permission to describe the status of Kinesis streaming and related details
                                                for a given table

DescribeLimits.name: DescribeLimits
DescribeLimits.description:
Returns the current provisioned-capacity limits for your AWS account in a region,
                                                both for the region as a whole and for any one DynamoDB table that you create there

DescribeReservedCapacity.name: DescribeReservedCapacity
DescribeReservedCapacity.description: Describes one or more of the Reserved Capacity purchased

DescribeReservedCapacityOfferings.name: DescribeReservedCapacityOfferings
DescribeReservedCapacityOfferings.description: Describes Reserved Capacity offerings that are available for purchase

DescribeStream.name: DescribeStream
DescribeStream.description:
Returns information about a stream, including the current status of the stream, its
                                                Amazon Resource Name (ARN), the composition of its shards, and its corresponding DynamoDB
                                                table

DescribeTableReplicaAutoScaling.name: DescribeTableReplicaAutoScaling
DescribeTableReplicaAutoScaling.description: Describes the auto scaling settings across all replicas of the global table

DescribeTimeToLive.name: DescribeTimeToLive
DescribeTimeToLive.description: Gives a description of the Time to Live (TTL) status on the specified table.

DisableKinesisStreamingDestination.name: DisableKinesisStreamingDestination
DisableKinesisStreamingDestination.description:
Grants permission to stop replication from the DynamoDB table to the Kinesis data
                                                stream

EnableKinesisStreamingDestination.name: EnableKinesisStreamingDestination
EnableKinesisStreamingDestination.description:
Grants permission to start table data replication to the specified Kinesis data stream
                                                at a timestamp chosen during the enable workflow

ExportTableToPointInTime.name: ExportTableToPointInTime
ExportTableToPointInTime.description: Initiates an Export of a DynamoDB table to S3

GetItem.name: GetItem
GetItem.description:
The GetItem operation returns a set of attributes for the item with the given primary
                                                key

GetRecords.name: GetRecords
GetRecords.description: Retrieves the stream records from a given shard

ListBackups.name: ListBackups
ListBackups.description: List backups associated with the account and endpoint

ListContributorInsights.name: ListContributorInsights
ListContributorInsights.description:
Lists the ContributorInsightsSummary for all tables and global secondary indexes associated
                                                with the current account and endpoint

ListExports.name: ListExports
ListExports.description: List exports associated with the account and endpoint

ListGlobalTables.name: ListGlobalTables
ListGlobalTables.description: Lists all global tables that have a replica in the specified region

ListStreams.name: ListStreams
ListStreams.description: Returns an array of stream ARNs associated with the current account and endpoint

ListTables.name: ListTables
ListTables.description: Returns an array of table names associated with the current account and endpoint

ListTagsOfResource.name: ListTagsOfResource
ListTagsOfResource.description: List all tags on an Amazon DynamoDB resource

PartiQLDelete.name: PartiQLDelete
PartiQLDelete.description: Grants permission to delete a single item in a table by primary key

PartiQLInsert.name: PartiQLInsert
PartiQLInsert.description:
Grants permission to create a new item, if an item with same primary key does not
                                                exist in the table

PartiQLSelect.name: PartiQLSelect
PartiQLSelect.description: Grants permission to read a set of attributes for items from a table or index

PartiQLUpdate.name: PartiQLUpdate
PartiQLUpdate.description: Grants permission to edit an existing item's attributes

PurchaseReservedCapacityOfferings.name: PurchaseReservedCapacityOfferings
PurchaseReservedCapacityOfferings.description: Purchases Reserved Capacity for use with your account

PutItem.name: PutItem
PutItem.description: Creates a new item, or replaces an old item with a new item

Query.name: Query
Query.description:
Uses the primary key of a table or a secondary index to directly access items from
                                                that table or index

RestoreTableFromBackup.name: RestoreTableFromBackup
RestoreTableFromBackup.description: Creates a new table from an existing backup

RestoreTableToPointInTime.name: RestoreTableToPointInTime
RestoreTableToPointInTime.description: Restores a table to a point in time

Scan.name: Scan
Scan.description:
Returns one or more items and item attributes by accessing every item in a table or
                                                a secondary index

TagResource.name: TagResource
TagResource.description: Associate a set of tags with an Amazon DynamoDB resource

UntagResource.name: UntagResource
UntagResource.description: Removes the association of tags from an Amazon DynamoDB resource.

UpdateContributorInsights.name: UpdateContributorInsights
UpdateContributorInsights.description:
Updates the status for contributor insights for a specific table or global secondary
                                                index

UpdateGlobalTable.name: UpdateGlobalTable
UpdateGlobalTable.description: Enables the user to add or remove replicas in the specified global table

UpdateGlobalTableSettings.name: UpdateGlobalTableSettings
UpdateGlobalTableSettings.description: Enables the user to update settings of the specified global table

UpdateItem.name: UpdateItem
UpdateItem.description:
Edits an existing item's attributes, or adds a new item to the table if it does not
                                                already exist

UpdateTable.name: UpdateTable
UpdateTable.description:
Modifies the provisioned throughput settings, global secondary indexes, or DynamoDB
                                                Streams settings for a given table

UpdateTableReplicaAutoScaling.name: UpdateTableReplicaAutoScaling
UpdateTableReplicaAutoScaling.description: Updates auto scaling settings on your replica table

UpdateTimeToLive.name: UpdateTimeToLive
UpdateTimeToLive.description: Enables or disables TTL for the specified table
